general.name: IT-Glue Automatic Documentation - M365 Admin Logs [WIN]
general.description:
Documents current logbooks for M365 admins Minimum Required OS: 2012R2+
Requires setup of M365 components first. Please see documentation at help.rmm.datto.com under the CyberDrain section of the Components spreadsheet.
Related blog: https://www.cyberdrain.com/documenting-with-powershell-documenting-admin-actions/
